meanings.definition: A device for projecting slides onto a screen.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used the stereopticons to show us pictures of animals.
meanings.sent2: The museum had an old stereopticon that displayed historical images.
meanings.sent3: During the presentation, the stereopticons suddenly started showing funny cartoons instead of the slides.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a stereopticon, projecting memories onto the screen of her consciousness.
meanings.sent5: The stereopticons illuminated the room with colorful images, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: A type of optical instrument used for viewing stereoscopic photographs.
meanings.sent1: We looked through the stereopticons to see the 3D pictures come to life.
meanings.sent2: The antique shop had a collection of stereopticons for sale.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they peered through the stereopticons and saw each other in funny distortions.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like stereopticons, seeing depth and dimension where others saw only flat surfaces.
meanings.sent5: The stereopticons transported us to a world where images popped out in vivid detail.
